name: Overhead Front Raise (with Weight Plate)
steps: Choose a weight plate and stand with your feet around shoulder width apart. Hold the weight plate with your palms facing one another at around the 3 and 9 o
With your back straight, contract your midsection and pull your shoulders back. This is the starting position for the exercise.
Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, slowly raise the plate until it is almost straight above your head.
Pause, and then slowly lower the plate back to the starting position.
tips: This is an isolation exercise so it
Keep the rep timing slow, and lower the weight slowly.
Keep your core tight and your back straight. Don
